page.title: 08OUR HOUSES IN PLOCKTON.
page.content: MOST OF OUR HOUSES ARE QUITE OLD,AND WERE BUILT AT THE BEGINNING OF THE 19th CENTURY.THEY HAVE{STONE WALLS}AND WERE ONCE{THATCHED.}THE HOUSES ARE NOW MODERNISED WITH UPSTAIRS IN THEM AND{ {SLATED ROOFS.}A FEW OF THE HOUSES ARE 3 STORIES HIGH.NEARLY ALL THE HOUSES ARE{HARLED}AND PAINTED{WHITE.}THERE ARE NEWER HOUSES AS WELL.THESE ARE THE COUNCIL HOUSES AND SOME BUNGALOWS.MOST OF THE HOUSES HAVE GARDENS BACK AND FRONT.THE{FRONT GARDENS}ARE FOR FLOWERS,AND THE{BACK}FOR DRYING WASHING AND GROWING VEGETABLES.IN PLOCKTON SOME GARDENS WERE BUILT UP ON LAND RECLAIMED FROM THE SEASHORE AND HAVE A STRONG WALL ROUND THEM TO KEEP OUT THE HIGH TIDES .THERE ARE A LOT OF HOUSES WHICH ARE ONLY OCCUPIED IN THE{SUMMER,}AS{HOLIDAY {COTTAGES.}IN PLOCKTON,ONE HOUSE IN FIVE IS VACANT DURING THE{WINTER.
